document_data.mainbody: '''''The Legend of Drizzt: Sojourn''''' (original title: '''''Forgotten Realms: The Legend of Drizzt, Volume 3: Sojourn'''''; reissued title: '''''Dungeons & Dragons: Forgotten Realms: The Legend of Drizzt, Volume 3: Sojourn''''') is the graphic novel version of [[R.A. Salvatore]]'s novel ''[[Sojourn]]''. It was originally published in three parts: ''The Legend of Drizzt: Sojourn'' #1–3.

document_data.Reprints: The ''[[The Legend of Drizzt: Sojourn (graphic novel)|The Legend of Drizzt: Sojourn Graphic Novel]]'' series was reprinted in 2006 as a paperback omnbius by [[wikipedia:en:Devil's Due Publishing|Devil's Due Publishing]]. It was released as a paperback omnibus in December 2015 by [[wikipedia:en:IDW Publishing|IDW Publishing]].
